subject: Fwd: A shipment from order #SSN4422 is on the way
description_text:
hi,

i need help on this on, what i have try
- re calibration
- try chance usb port
- ground cable new position

and i can get about 20 kg on load cell, i can not drive like this

-Jan

On Thu, Dec 11, 2025 at 5:16 PM Jan Ylitalo <jan.ylitalo@gmail.com> wrote:

> hello,
>
> I just got my new pedals, I don't quite understand that when I calibrate
> the brake I can only push 20kg, even though I think I can easily push 150kg
> and that's why I can't set the brake settings to my liking, could you give
> me some advice on what to do with the brake, and so I think I'm pushing
> with quite a lot of force and still only 20kg
>
> -Jan
>

conversations.body_text:
hi,

i need help on this on, what i have try
- re calibration
- try chance usb port
- ground cable new position

and i can get about 20 kg on load cell, i can not drive like this

-Jan

i dont find my ticket and i dont know update startus

-Jan

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 3:31 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Jan Ylitalo,  If you have adjusted the brake, you can set the Offset in the software to reset the pedal signal, and then recalibrate the pedal. If you want to adjust the pedal force, you can use damping shims of different colors, with the red shim set by default for 50–60kg.
ID 为 7996 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7996  
      主题: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4422 is on the way  
      描述:  hello,   
 I just got my new pedals, I don't quite understand that when I calibrate the brake I can only push 20kg, even though I think I can easily push 150kg and that's why I can't set the brake settings to my liking, could you give me some advice on what to do with the brake, and so I think I'm pushing with quite a lot of force and still only 20kg 
   
 -Jan
